__e: There's been a lot that has changed recently, Thea and I think that maybe this can change too.
I thought you said Thea and her boyfriend went out of town.
Because you are my daughter, Thea, and I care about you.
Any idea what this son of a bitch wants with Thea Queen? No.
I thought I could still be Thea Queen.
It means... and no offense... But in a multiverse of possibilities there's no world where Thea Queen goes out with, you know, someone like you.
Thea, I know that you're mad at mom and me, but we may have found a way out of this financial mess where we aren't going to lose everything.
Thea, I know you want to believe there's more to me than a killer, but the fact is, there's not.
And I can't go back to the way things were, Thea, I can't just go back to being nothing.
